name: Button Up Cowl in Carnival
description:
A perfect accessory for these cold winter months! Snuggle and wrap yourself up in this warm and cozy cowl. I love the diversity of this cowl as there are so many different ways to wear it! Wear it with casual clothes or when your all dressed up! It also makes a great gift. What a perfect way to stay warm, cozy and fashionable.

I hand crocheted this colorful cowl using an extra soft 100% acrylic yarn. I love to use acrylic yarn because its washable. Just throw it in the wash and lay it flat to dry. The colors of this cowl flow beautiful with one another! This yarn will not itch. I used two buttons made from coconuts on this cowl. They look awesome on this! I made the buttons small enough so that they can slip right between the stitches but big enough to stay put.

All my items come beautifully wrapped and include a card. If you are sending an item(s) as a gift(s), please let me know what you would like your card to say :)

To see my whole collection go here:
http://www.MegansMenagerie.etsy.com

name: Black Fingerless Gloves
description:
These comfortable fingerless gloves are hand crocheted using 100% soft acrylic yarn. This yarn will not itch. They measure approx 10 inches long (25 cm) and have thumb holes. This is a great length to keep your hands and arms warm and is just plain stylish! 

***The hat pictured is sold seperately.*** 

All my items come beautifully wrapped and include a card. If you are sending an item(s) as a gift(s), please let me know what you would like your card to say :)

http://www.MegansMenagerie.etsy.com

name: The Yorkshire Cowl in Houston Cream
description:
Snuggle yourself up in this warm, cozy, and super soft chunky cowl! This is a perfect accessory to add to your wardrobe.

I hand crocheted this cowl using a soft bulky yarn to keep the cold out and the warmth in. The thickness of this cowl and the stitch I use allows you to shape it many different ways. Wear it as pictured to the right or pull it up over your nose when you venture outdoors and slip it back down once your out of the cold. Its super versatile and super comfy!

Yarn: 100% Acrylic

Care: This yarn is machine washable and dryable but for best care, hand wash and lay flat to dry.

All my items come beautifully wrapped and include a card. If you are sending an item(s) as a gift(s), please let me know what you would like your card to say :)

name: Cascade of Ruffles Scarf in Oak Tweed Fishermans Wool
description:
I hand crocheted the cascade of ruffles scarf using soft fishermans wool and two strands of wool together to make it nice and thick and keep the cold out. It is such a fun scarf as there are beautiful ruffles that spiral downwards and can be worn many different ways! Wear it with casual clothes or when your all dressed up! It also makes a great gift. What a perfect way to stay warm, cozy and fashionable.

For best care hand wash and lay flat to dry.

All my items come beautifully wrapped and include a card. If you are sending an item(s) as a gift(s), please let me know what you would like your card to say :)

name: Black Jersey Tee Circle Scarf
description:
The perfect accessory to be worn all year long! Dressed up or dressed down this circle scarf is gorgeous. The Jersey Tee scarf is made from 100% cotton. Its great to wear on those cool summer evenings or those cold winter nights. This scarf can be worn as one loop or two...both ways are shown in the pictures to the right. It is so comfortable!

The longest loop hangs at approx 25 inches (63.5 cm). The item you are ordering is not the same one that is on the model. Your item will be handmade to order, just for you!

All my items come beautifully wrapped and include a card. If you are sending an item(s) as a gift(s), please let me know what you would like your card to say :)
